message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay up to $850000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to lower the price to $900000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and rarity.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget, I would like to propose a price of $875000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment to meet you halfway. I'm willing to lower the price to $885000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise considering the product's value and rarity.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $880000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable.

I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to lower the price to $890000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and rarity.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $887500 for the product. I hope this will be within your consideration.

I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to lower the price to $892500. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and rarity.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget, I would like to propose a final price of $890000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
